member.name: T:Autodesk.WPFControls.DelcamButton
member.summary: DelcamButton is the standard button that should be used. It inherits from the DelcamLinkButton It has the following features: - Ability to glow on mouse over and fade on mouse out - Separate properties for Image and Content - Alternate content property to cycle through a collection of images and texts on each click. This is similar to a toggle button but with multiple states - A status image intended to indicate Red/Amber/Green status - Horizontal/Vertical alignment of Image and Content items

member.name: F:Autodesk.WPFControls.DelcamButton.PART_StatusImage
member.summary: Constant string to define the name of the StatusImage TemplatePart. The Status Image indicates a Red/Amber/Green Status

member.name: M:Autodesk.WPFControls.DelcamButton.#cctor
member.summary: Shared constructor initialises the default template

member.name: M:Autodesk.WPFControls.DelcamButton.OnApplyTemplate
member.summary: This operation binds the StatusImage's properties to properties of this class

member.summary: This is the Source of the image used to indicate status

member.summary: This is the Source of the image used to indicate status
member.returns: Source of the image used to indicate status
member.value: Source of the image used to indicate status

member.summary: This is the height of the image used to indicate status

member.summary: This is the height of the image used to indicate status
member.returns: Height of the image in pixels

member.name: T:Autodesk.WPFControls.DelcamLinkButton
member.summary: DelcamLinkButton is a simple hyperlink style button. It is also the base class for DelcamButton It has the following features: - Ability to glow on mouse over and fade on mouse out - Separate properties for Image and Content - Alternate content property to cycle through a collection of images and texts on each click. This is similar to a toggle button but with multiple states - Horizontal/Vertical alignment of Image and Content items

member.name: F:Autodesk.WPFControls.DelcamLinkButton.PART_Content
member.summary: Constant string to define the name of the Content TemplatePart. Not sure this is needed as the base class is a ContentControl

member.name: F:Autodesk.WPFControls.DelcamLinkButton.PART_Image
member.summary: Constant string to define the name of the Image TemplatePart.

member.summary: Holds whether the Alternative Content/Image are currently displayed or not

member.summary: This is the source of the default image

member.summary: This is the orientation of the Image and Content. Horizontal will place the Image on the left and the Content on the right Vertical will place the Image on the top and the Content on the bottom

member.name: T:Autodesk.WPFControls.DelcamTextBox
member.summary: This class is the Delcam Text Box. It is like a normal TextBox but allows you to add a cue that will fade out as you type It can also be used as a search box with a magnifying glass

member.name: M:Autodesk.WPFControls.DelcamTextBox.#cctor
member.summary: Shared constructor initializes look and behavior

member.name: F:Autodesk.WPFControls.DelcamTextBox.TextBoxCueProperty
member.summary: This is the cue dependency property. Whatever you put in here will be shown when there is no text and will fade out as you type

member.name: P:Autodesk.WPFControls.DelcamTextBox.TextBoxCue
member.summary: Gets and sets the cue property. Whatever you put in here will be shown when there is no text and will fade out as you type

member.name: F:Autodesk.WPFControls.DelcamTextBox.IsEmptyPropertyKey
member.summary: This is the Key for the IsEmpty DependencyProperty

member.name: F:Autodesk.WPFControls.DelcamTextBox.IsEmptyProperty
member.summary: This is the IsEmpty DependencyProperty. It identifies whether or not there is text in the TextBox

member.name: P:Autodesk.WPFControls.DelcamTextBox.IsEmpty
member.summary: Gets whether or not there is text in the TextBox
member.returns: Whether or not there is text in the TextBox

member.name: F:Autodesk.WPFControls.DelcamTextBox.IsSearchBoxProperty
member.summary: This dependency property specifies whether it is a search box. If it is then a magnifying glass will appear

member.name: P:Autodesk.WPFControls.DelcamTextBox.IsSearchBox
member.summary: Gets and sets whether or not this is a search box. If it is then a magnifying glass will appear

member.name: M:Autodesk.WPFControls.DelcamTextBox.TextPropertyChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: This operation keeps the IsEmpty DependencyProperty up to date
